<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Two-Hand 1d8" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=198" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 127, [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 277 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Favored Weapon** [Andoletta](/Deities.aspx?ID=464), [Apsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=330), [Arundhat](/Deities.aspx?ID=610), [Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=395), [Bergelmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=491), [Blooms Of The Spreading Weald](/Deities.aspx?ID=365), [Ceyannan](/Deities.aspx?ID=535), [Chamiaholom](/Deities.aspx?ID=593), [Charon](/Deities.aspx?ID=391), [Etaris](/Deities.aspx?ID=624), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=461), [Folgrit](/Deities.aspx?ID=448), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Kofusachi](/Deities.aspx?ID=309), [Lorthact](/Deities.aspx?ID=670), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos)](/Deities.aspx?ID=573), [Ptah](/Deities.aspx?ID=638), [Rowdrosh](/Deities.aspx?ID=652), [The Enlightened Scholar's Path](/Deities.aspx?ID=251), [The Lost Prince](/Deities.aspx?ID=456), [Vapula](/Deities.aspx?ID=532), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208), [Yelayne](/Deities.aspx?ID=630)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** —

**Damage** 1d4 B

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Type** Melee

**Category** Simple

**Group** [Club](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

</column>

---

This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-5" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Twining Staff](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2874)
